doc:
Richard S. Castellano https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_S._Castellano 0 Richard Salvatore Castellano (September 4, 1933 – December 10, 1988) was an American actor who is best remembered for his Oscar-nominated role in Lovers and Other Strangers and his subsequent role as Peter Clemenza in The Godfather. Richard_Salvatore_Castellano ( September_4_,_1933 – December_10_,_1988 ) was an_American_actor who is_best_remembered for his_Oscar-nominated_role in Lovers and Other_Strangers and his_subsequent_role as Peter_Clemenza in The_Godfather .
